  • Method Details

    • special

      public void special(Battleship.PlayerHandler playerHandler, Battleship game) throws PlayerNotFoundException, InvalidSyntaxException, InvalidPositionException
      Overrides the special action for character one, targeting a row on the opponent's map based on the player's message.
      Specified by:
      special in class Character
      Parameters:
      playerHandler - The player handler for the current player.
      game - The Battleship game instance.
      Throws:
      PlayerNotFoundException - If the opponent player is not found.
      InvalidSyntaxException - If there is an issue with the syntax of the player's message.
      InvalidPositionException - If there is an issue with the row extracted from the player's message.

    • getRow

      private int getRow(String message) throws InvalidSyntaxException
      Extracts the row number from the provided message.
      Parameters:
      message - The message containing the row information.
      Returns:
      The extracted row number.
      Throws:
      InvalidSyntaxException - If there is an issue with the syntax of the message.

    • checkValidRow

      private void checkValidRow(int row, List<List<String>> myMap) throws InvalidPositionException
      Checks if the specified row is valid within the given map.
      Parameters:
      row - The row to be checked.
      myMap - The map to validate the row against.
      Throws:
      InvalidPositionException - If the row is not valid.

    • doSpecial

      private void doSpecial(int row, Battleship.PlayerHandler opponent, Battleship.PlayerHandler playerHandler)
      Performs the special action for character one, targeting a row on the opponent's map. Checks for mines, handles mine explosions, and updates the player's map based on the hit result.
      Parameters:
      row - The row position to be targeted.
      opponent - The opponent player handler.
      playerHandler - The player handler for the current player.
